message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand where you're coming from, but I'm looking for something closer to $165.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I understand your point, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $155 for the product.
